mapper.insert: insert into crew (crew_num, crew_name, crew_info, captain_email, crew_created, crew_paydate, crew_paymoney, crew_goal, crew_accountid, crew_bank) values (#{crew_num}, #{crew_name}, #{crew_info}, #{captain_email}, sysdate, #{crew_paydate}, #{crew_paymoney}, #{crew_goal}, #{crew_accountid}, #{crew_bank})
insert into crew_member (crew_num, cmem_email, captain_YN, join_date, total_pay, must_paycount, real_paycount) values (#{crew_num}, #{cmem_email}, 'Y', sysdate, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: select myaccount_bank, myaccount_anum from my_account where email = #{email} order by myaccount_date
select myaccount_name from my_account where myaccount_anum = #{myaccount_anum};
